attributes.action: to ensure that the so called goverment will give all the help needed to Naomi House Childrens Hospice, Hampshire after the fall of the Icelandic Banks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Naomi House is a purpose built Childrens Hospice in Hampshire.  They offer care to children with life threatening illnesses , aswell as their parents,brothers and sisters. After the fall of the Icelandic Banks, in which the hospice had over £5 million invested in the Goverment has told them they will not offer ANY financial help.By doing this the Goverment is turning its back on the children and families who get such great care from this amazing place. I am doing this to get the british public to make a stand for a fantastic charity, one we all hope we will never need help from.
